items.name: Darkray Vectors
enchantMods: Damage Penetrates 10% of Enemy Elemental Resistances if you haven't Killed Recently
explicitMods: 66% increased Armour and Evasion
10% increased Evasion Rating per Frenzy Charge
+40% to Lightning Resistance
5% increased Movement Speed per Frenzy Charge
+1 to Maximum Frenzy Charges
40% reduced Frenzy Charge Duration
25% reduced Light Radius
flavourText: "Sirrius flew on wings of light, faster than wind, faster
than thought. But try as he might to outrun the darkness,
it was there, at every turn, waiting for him."

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants extra cold damage based on physical damage to you and your allies.
explicitMods: +2 metres to radius
You and nearby allies gain 26% of Physical Damage as Extra Cold Damage
You and nearby allies deal 19% more Cold Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Grants a buff which lets you deal more physical damage. When you kill an enemy while you have this buff, this skill will summon a Sentinel of Purity, or refresh the duration and life of an existing one instead if you have the maximum number of them. The Sentinels of Purity have a single-target melee attack and an area melee attack.
explicitMods: Base duration is 12.00 seconds
Maximum 4 Summoned Sentinels of Purity
Minions have 40% more Maximum Life
Summon a Sentinel of Purity when you Kill an Enemy
20% chance to Summon a Sentinel of Purity when you Hit a Rare or Unique Enemy
Buff grants 13% more Physical Damage
Minions deal 100% more Physical Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Woe Circle
explicitMods: Grants Level 20 Aspect of the Cat Skill
Adds 12 to 19 Physical Damage to Attacks
Adds 1 to 2 Fire Damage to Attacks
+43% to Cold Resistance
craftedMods: Non-Channelling Skills have -7 to Total Mana Cost

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill that has a duration.
explicitMods: Supported Skills deal 19% more Damage
Supported Skills have 59% less Skill Effect Duration
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Lion's Roar
enchantMods: Used when you Hit a Rare or Unique Enemy, if not already in effect
explicitMods: Knocks Back Enemies in an Area when you use a Flask
75% chance to cause Enemies to Flee on use
Adds Knockback to Melee Attacks during Effect
10% more Melee Physical Damage during effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: A sprinkle of hunger, a spoonful of menace
and three generous cups of Might.

items.name: Starlight Chalice
enchantMods: Used when you Hit a Rare or Unique Enemy, if not already in effect
explicitMods: 29% increased Charge Recovery
Inflict Fire, Cold and Lightning Exposure on nearby Enemies when used
25% increased Effect of Non-Damaging Ailments you inflict during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: Uhtred and his priests drank of the skies

items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Bottled Faith
enchantMods: Used when you Hit a Rare or Unique Enemy, if not already in effect
explicitMods: 23% reduced Duration
Consecrated Ground created by this Flask has Tripled Radius
Consecrated Ground created during Effect applies 8% increased Damage taken to Enemies
141% increased Critical Strike Chance against Enemies on Consecrated Ground during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: A tourniquet for the soul, squeezing ethereal into physical.

items.name: Maloney's Mechanism
explicitMods: Has 2 Sockets
Trigger a Socketed Bow Skill when you Attack with a Bow, with a 1 second Cooldown
12% increased Attack Speed
+58 to maximum Life
5% chance to Blind Enemies on Hit with Attacks
flavourText: a sinister shaft surreptitiously shot slays a scoundrel.
I will see them again, but not until my work is done.

items.name: Miracle Nock
explicitMods: Adds 4 to 6 Fire Damage
Adds 4 to 76 Lightning Damage
+46% to Lightning Resistance
Gain 12 Life per Enemy Killed
Gain 4 Mana per Enemy Killed

items.name: Vessel of Vinktar
enchantMods: Used when you Hit a Rare or Unique Enemy, if not already in effect
explicitMods: 144% increased Charges per use
Shocks nearby Enemies during Effect, causing 10% increased Damage taken
You are Shocked during Effect, causing 50% increased Damage taken
50% of Physical Damage Converted to Lightning during Effect
20% of Lightning Damage Leeched as Life during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: The great city of storms, washed away by Vinktar's thirst for power.
